title: Dynamic Queue Squad
body:
Hey guys,

I'm a Gold 4 ADC main who's getting sick of those SoloQ tyrants that wander around ruining our games. Looking for a couple of people who would like to embark on a magical journey with me as we battle through the harsh terrain of SoloQ into the Land of Plat. 

My IGN is Gumball hmu if you wanna get some free LP.
- Gold+ preferred.

replies.body:
'solo queue tyrants'

is this a joke?
